column4: what's the supported upgrade path from Debian woody = Ubuntu?  Hoary or Warty?
IIRC there was an item on the Wiki about it.
hmm... OK... I guess it's possible - as far as I know, it's not encouraged ;)
but if you're the karsten I'm thinking you are, you will know how to avoid the pitfalls
Got someone trying an Debian install w/ ls-120 superdisk, floppy, various rootfs issues.  My recommendation is to either put the HD in another system or another system's CD in this one.
I can.  The n00b I'm assisting may not ;-)
Where do I know you from?
a /whois tells me who you are and I've red some of your stuff :)
heheh OK, just checking - a nice coinage then ;)
